text: when I copy a module path from my design manager. and call it in the react template it works. but when I create e module in react and call it here it doesn't work. Can anyone help me to solve this. I am a beginner

Hi everyone
I am using ui-extensions and I created an app card using react but I am struggling to make any async requests. I am trying to send the id of the deal to by backend but it's giving me an error. I followed this guide on setting it up: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/guides/crm/ui-extensions/create>. This is the error I get when I try to send the request: Uncaught (in promise) Error: Access to storage is not allowed from this context.
